website_summaries.verdict: Very low price for a fairway wood that's more than serviceable for high handicap golfers.
pros: Gives you a multitude of options in the club face loft, so you can be sure to have the right club on hand for your needs
Uses a draw-weighted design to attempt to help those players who often slice the ball
Extremely low price point versus other fairway woods
cons: Very basic design in a golf club, so advanced golfers won't receive the benefits they want

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good weight, very well made
customer_reviews.text: Fed-Ex delivered much earlier than expected, always a plus. I had recently purchased the Founders 13 Wood, which easily replaced my 4/5/6 Irons. This Founders 7 Wood, now replaces my 3/5 /9 Woods. It seems that there is something about these fairway woods, maybe their weight but this 7-Wood puts the ball farther down the fairway, than my 3/5/9 Woods.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very forgiving
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Bought 11and 13 woods and they are my go-to clubs . Very forgiving. If you have trouble with mid irons, these are the answer. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Frank LoRusso

customer_reviews.title: 15 degree loft 3 wood is not as good as a 13 degree loft 3 wood
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 15 degree loft 3 wood with an offset shaft thinking that i could hit it at least as far as my old 13 degree loft 3 wood, but straighter. I have found it to be woefully shorter in distance than my former 3 wood. It seems that even with the offset shaft I am unable to hit it straighter than my former 3 wood. I am not satisfied with my new club. Incidentally, my offset shafted driver is helping me hit the ball much straighter and longer off the tee than did my old driver, which is why I thought the new offset 3 wood would help me compared to the old 3 wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gap Club!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice club. A great add on for me 160-180 yards is perfect. It's easy to get the ball up for a shot that comes in high. I'm enjoying the club.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this 11 wood. I hit fairway woods much better than irons, so I thought I would add this to the bag. It’s longer than my 7 iron (which it replaced) and more accurate. In addition, the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: James L. Bement

customer_reviews.title: My review is simple I tried the 30 degree, ...
customer_reviews.text: My review is simple I tried the 30 degree , then the 33 degree, now ordering the 15 degree, now so that you understand I will tell you that I'm replacing the Calloway epic 3 wood and the epic heaven wood , thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very forgiving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this club to play 1 hole on a local course and have used it as a go to club for 180-200 yard shots it paid for its self the first time I played with it. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MARBEN

customer_reviews.title: I'll probably work on getting a whole set of these clubs
customer_reviews.text: This is the first golf club I've owned by this company. I was very impressed with the quality of the product and the ease that it is to use. It looks very handsome in my bag and has a nice head cover to.
customer_reviews.author: Ennis Darnell Stump

customer_reviews.title: Great Club
customer_reviews.text: This is one great club. I really like it and am hitting it as far as my 7 wood. My golf partner used it and I had to order him one too. Now you have two happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: great club, I prefer a larger grip so I ...
customer_reviews.text: great club, I prefer a larger grip so I think I will re-grip it but its a great addition to my bag
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: I call it my $49 special
customer_reviews.text: love this club, it's a cheap but a great club. I'm a newly at golf, suck with irons and this thing works great. It's got me out of the rough and sand as well, both of which I'm very good at ending up in..lol
customer_reviews.author: ltsgt2gether

customer_reviews.title: The club is actually too good. I bought it to hit about 100 yard ...
customer_reviews.text: The club is actually too good. I bought it to hit about 100 yard shots. The ball actually travels 120-130 yards. Amazing. I think I'll thry the 15 wood next.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Mendo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hit!
customer_reviews.text: This club sets up nicely and instills confidence. The slight offset tends to produce a sweet little draw, which I,love. Certainly a bargain for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Leo in Kissimmee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money. Well constructed and performs like a club that would cost four or five times more. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mike s

customer_reviews.title: A 9-wood is a great addition to a senior's bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great club...and for a great price. I'm about a 12-handicap, and as I've gotten older, it's just gotten harder to regularly hit good-quality long irons; so I've used a 7-wood for my 170-yard (4-iron) shots for many years, and now it's nice to add a 9-wood (to replace my 5-iron) to hit those important 160-yard shots. This is a fine-quality club, at a low price, I only wish I had bought it sooner. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Precisely What I Need
customer_reviews.text: I can't hit irons so I purchased this club for shortish work. Went to the range and knocked it way up for about a hundred yards. Love the feel. And when I can connect properly, I love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Best 3 wood I've ever hit. IMO
customer_reviews.text: Each time I've hit with this club I've been impressed. The sound of the ball coming off the face is satisfying to say the least. Ball flight is straight and the club is solid and well made. If you want a 3 wood then get this one.⛳🤘👍
customer_reviews.author: Ubangie

customer_reviews.title: nice club
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time everything is fine,really like the club, you have proven that good clubs do not have to cost an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Nice fairway club
customer_reviews.text: Needed an updated seven wood. The head is larger than my previous club so contact with the golf ball is better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this fairway wood!
customer_reviews.text: Great club, replaces my 5-iron perfectly, which is good cause I have problems with my lower irons. Nice balance, practically swings itself. Great price,
customer_reviews.author: thumper

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOOKING GOLF CLUB
customer_reviews.text: MY FIRST FOUNDERS CLUB IT IS VERY WELL MADE AND IS AS ADVERTIZED I HIT IT FARTHER THAN I THOUGHT I WOULD LIKE IT A LOT
customer_reviews.author: GRUMPFROM RI

customer_reviews.title: Less money can be better
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble hitting my old 3 wood. I have a founders 5 and 9 wood and hit them both well. I decided to try the fc 3. I am hitting it better than my old big named 3 wood. More expensive clubs won’t make you hit it better. Great clubs
customer_reviews.author: richard w bull

customer_reviews.title: Ok club
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Club head is little to heavy, otherwise is okay for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: A Great Club
customer_reviews.text: A very easy club to hit. Only played with it a couple of times so far, but love it so far. The absolute best club for the money.
customer_reviews.author: cpdpao

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf club
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Fresh Metal fairway wood. So far I like all three. They consistently go the same distance, which is all I ask in a club. The rest is up to me.
customer_reviews.author: Villager

customer_reviews.title: Nice club for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived a little early and is a great club
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product!
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first round I played! The club head completely broke off from the shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: As a senior citizen, I have been looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: As a senior citizen, I have been looking for a club such as the 7 wood. Saves me a stroke or two a round. Great😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: regaining lost distance due to age, or injury's.
customer_reviews.text: it would be nice if founders would make a hybrid that would cover thru the typical pitching wedge loft for the SENIOR Seniors who have lost much of their distance with typical irons. 47*,48* 49* as example.
customer_reviews.author: james  w.  mosier

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are well made clubs. I have both a 9 and a 15 degree. They equal about a 6 and an 8 iron. They feel really solid and swing well. Good weighting
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: You get what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing making it hard to hit about this club is the offset head. After I got used to it, I was glad I got it. It replaced two mid-irons in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: DANA R ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: great for par 3s
customer_reviews.text: Bought this club especially for the 150yd par 3s. once I used it a few times to learn the position of the ball v. my stance, it provided very true straight lofts. won a couple of closet to the pin awards already in my league play.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN LEE

customer_reviews.title: Great value, well made
customer_reviews.text: Good club, I thought the shaft was a little long for the loft, But it is a well constructed club with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: HennyB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 3 wood
customer_reviews.text: What a great club can farther shots off the tee I love this club
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Ball gets up!
customer_reviews.text: Having issues getting my 4-5 iron up in the air as I gracefully age. Hitting this about 175-185 high and soft.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Its better than I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I brought this club for the 135 yard shots. Its better than I had hoped for. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to irons
customer_reviews.text: I love this club. I liked it so much I also bout the #15 and #17
customer_reviews.author: Mary Michlin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hits good off the ground.Lacks some distance but is straight.
customer_reviews.author: bazooka

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best $50 I ever spent for a golf club so much easier to hit than a mid size iron love it
customer_reviews.author: bill hyer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: it helps me to get the ball up in the air which was a problem for me using the long irons. Great fit!!
customer_reviews.author: david dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Best $50 fairway club
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fairway club for when I was 150 yards out, I am amazed how well this performs for only $50
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: the club arrived on time, great quality and an excellent value. will visit this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so good. The order was filled promptly
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning how to hit it, but so far, so good. The order was filled promptly. Now it's up to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: made a great addition to my club set
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, made a great addition to my club set.
customer_reviews.author: James R. McLain

customer_reviews.title: very easy to hit
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy hitting this club. the more i hit it the better i like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. It is a first rate club.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Aigeldinger

customer_reviews.title: I found the bullet clubs to be better suited to my game
customer_reviews.text: Serviceable clubs. However, I found the bullet clubs to be better suited to my game.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M. Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Would have really liked the club
customer_reviews.text: Would have really liked the club, but it was right hand club. thought it was available for lefties. Lefties are really discriminated against when it comes to golf clubs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have never written an Amazon revue before because all of my hundreds of past purchases have meet my expectations. This is the first item I've bought which disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: John Clements

customer_reviews.title: So worth the Price! Makes golf fun again!
customer_reviews.text: Goes strait at Target from any lie; Perfect 7 Wood!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo T.

product_meta.title: Founders Club Fresh Metal Golf Clubs Fairway Woods with Graphite Shaft and Head Cover
product_meta.description: The Fresh Metal Fairway woods are designed to give all players the confidence to hit consistent, high and accurate shots from the rough, fairway or off the tee. The Offset helps cure the common slice by promoting a high drawing ball flight for increased distance and control. The Fresh Metal woods incorporate the famous Founders Club rails and easy lie sole for more confidence when addressing the ball. The grip is a stylish dual material half cord grip. The Fresh Metal Fairway Woods come with a matching head cover. They are available with low torque graphite shafts in Regular or Senior Flex, Right Hand only.
feature_bullets: Low Torque Regular Flex Graphite Shaft
